Uses of Formula in org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.logic
 

Subinterfaces of Formula in org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.logic
 interface ClassicalNegation
          Represents the classical negation of a formula.
 interface Conjunction
          A formula that represents the conjunction of other formulae.
 interface DefaultNegation
          Represents the default negation (negation-as-failure) of a formula.
 interface Disjunction
          A formula that represents the disjunction of other formulae.
 interface Equivalence
          Represents an equivalence formula.
 interface Exists
          Implements an existentially quantified formula.
 interface FactFormula
          This is a tagging interface that identifies formulae that represent facts.
 interface Forall
          Implements a universally quantified formula.
 interface Implication
          Represents an implication formula.
 interface Literal
          Represents a literal in the rule.
 interface Rule
          Represents a rule in the program.
